children.value: The typography for our marketing pages differs slightly from what is in Primer CSS's core--it is responsive, on a slightly different scale, and headlines are in a different font (Roboto).
to change an element's font, size, and weight on marketing pages.

These utilities are meant to be used in addition to Primer CSS's core utilities.

I'm a lead paragraph. Bacon ipsum dolor amet tri-tip chicken kielbasa, cow swine beef corned beef ground round prosciutto hamburger porchetta sausage alcatra tail.

I'm a pullquote. Someone said these words in real life, and now they're on the internet
